scripts.build-wasm: docker build --build-arg='BROTLI_TAG=v1.1.0' build-wasm -t brotli-build:latest && docker create --name temp_container brotli-build:latest && docker cp temp_container:/src/dist/brotli.js ./build-wasm/dist/brotli.js && docker cp temp_container:/src/dist/brotli.wasm ./build-wasm/dist/brotli.wasm && docker rm temp_container
scripts.build-wasm1: docker build --build-arg='BROTLI_TAG=v1.1.0' build-wasm -t brotli-build:latest && docker create --name temp_container brotli-build:latest && docker cp temp_container:/src/dist/brotli.wasm ./build-wasm/dist/brotli.wasm && docker rm temp_container
